website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you want an alternative design.
pros: Convenient armband design is lightweight and easy to use
Comes with stickers so kids can customize the unit
cons: The alarm is somewhat soft and might not wake deep sleepers

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it was possible, but this stopped my 7 year olds bed wetting in 10 days. It said it would take up to six weeks, but it happened so fast. He loved that he could design it himself and it helped with motivation. He never complained that it was uncomfortable. I had him wear underwear and a pull up over the underwear and it worked great. I cannot recommend this enough. You do need a child that is willing and motivated.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Working
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how, but it's working. My 13year old was very happy I purchased it, and took it upon himself to read the directions and put it together. He was having accidents pretty much every night. Since this gadget he's been dry for over a week. I'll try to keep updating, but I'm very pleased. He was a premie and also has ADHD, We've seen professionals. We've limited his fluids, We woke him up through the nights. Nothing has worked till now, and I hope and pray it continues . This coming Monday will mark 2 full weeks of being dry. Best thing I could've bought. Wished I would have done this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: When it was working, it was great, but I’ve only had it for a month and it has stopped working. When I check it with water it goes off, but for some reason when the kids wear it at night, it never goes off. We are not doing anything different. This is beyond frustrating, as I have two kiddos that keep wetting the bed multiple times a night and this is my second bed alarm (first one different brand) that has stopped working. For $50 I certainly expected it to last. Very disappointed and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: reneesb04

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT LOUD...don't get for deep sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: Alarm has some great features, but IT IS NOT AT ALL LOUD. Not only did it not wake my 6-year old up, it didn't wake me up. Even when I tested it with the baby alarm on the highest volume and my bedroom right next door to my son's, I couldn't hear the alarm go off so I don't see how this would ever be effective unless your kid is a light sleeper. It's a shame because the arm band is comfortable and it's very well designed compared to other alarms. But the DryEasy Bedwetting Alarm with Volume Control is Much, much, much louder.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Z

customer_reviews.title: you will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for only 3 weeks. They are awesome. We have 5 yr old twins who virtually never kept dry at night, until now! One of my daughters is a deep sleeper. It took her 3 nights and I haven't changed her sheets! The alarm is quiet, but the sound and vibration wakes her. Now she gets up on her own. My other daughter is taking a little longer, but I haven't changed sheets in 3 nights. This alarm is so sensitive that when it senses one droplet it goes off. Often, I don't even have to change pjs, just underware. I wish I bought these a year ago! FYI, I've never written a review before.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Sokira-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Clip broke in less than a week
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was great... The batteries do not last as long as I hoped they would but that I could live with it. Tonight when putting the clip onto my son's underwear, the piece to close the clip broke. I want to cry. My son was so excited to have this product and end the wet nights... And honestly for the cost you would think you were not paying for a cheap plastic piece that breaks in under a week of use!
customer_reviews.author: C & J

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how well this worked!
customer_reviews.text: This worked fantastic for my son. He doesn't like loud noises and at first would shut it off after we tucked him in. He told us it was too loud, so we put it on his ankle so it would be farther away from his ear. This worked out very well and three weeks later he is waking up on his own to use the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morris-Robinson

customer_reviews.title: The final solution!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: IT WORKS!!! Bought this for our 7 year old son who would have many dry nights but also suffered from bed wetting due to the fact he is such a heavy sleeper. Within just s couple weeks he was able to go to a sleepover (without the alarm) and have no accidents with no worries. This alarm was seriously a blessing! Cons: the alarm is not extremely loud which is both a good and bad thing. Good if you have other children you do not want to wake up in the night. Bad if parents room is far away from kids.
customer_reviews.author: Dereck

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to help train our son to recognize when he needs to wake for night time bed-wetting. I have a few frustrations with it. The first is that there have been a lot of false alarms, and they won't stop, even when turning off the alarm. (This can be very frustrating in the middle of the night). Even after a good cleaning. We usually have to restart it in the morning and start the training process all over again. :( We also don't like how it attaches to the arm. It falls off easily. We are looking to buy another alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Zeigler

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE, WORKED PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: Pediatrician recommended we get an alarm for my 6 1/2 year old. I was so skeptical because my husband's family has a history of bedwetting (even into high school!) and alarms haven't worked for them. I really thought it was a lost cause. We've been using it for about 5 weeks. He's now out of pull ups and just this week he started getting up on his own to go. SO HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT! **The instructions recommend not putting a pull-up over the underwear, but we did because I just wasn't into cleaning up pee every night. It still worked!! **AND it is simple enough that he, at 6 years old, can manage it himself.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Changed our lives!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old son was waking up wet 5-6 times a week. Within 2 weeks of using the alarm, he was waking up dry 5-6 times a week! After 5 weeks, he was dry every day. I read the reviews prior to purchasing and was hopeful yet a tad bit skeptical. Our doctor recommended it, so we went for it. This has been a life changer! I went from washing his sheets, pajamas, stuffed animals, etc. daily to waking up one day thinking to myself, "Gee, I really need to wash his sheets! When was the last time they have been washed??" :) We couldn't be happier with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya R.

customer_reviews.title: The the false alarms and arm band are the worst parts... its always loose...
customer_reviews.text: We have been having our son use this for about 8 days... within that small amount of time the arm band has already gotten to the point that it has to be adjusted all the time. The unit goes off randomly, which in turns wake no only my son up, but also my wife and I when he comes wondering downstairs looking for help with the thing. When its not giving false alarms or falling off his arm it works fine, but I really can't recommend this unit to someone.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for the first week. After that we had issues with it continually. It would not stop beeping. We tried all of the tips that were suggested which worked for another 2 weeks. We did switch the batteries twice in that two weeks which solved it but after that it would not stop beeping. I just returned it today. Very frustrating since we were three weeks in and it takes 3 months to train according to the directions. There are a few troubleshooting tips and then it states that it might just be a faulty product that needs to be replaced or returned. That is a red flag to me for future purchase
customer_reviews.author: Shari S.

customer_reviews.title: Batteries run out QUICKLY
customer_reviews.text: The first alarm we purchased only worked for two nights and then determined by the company that it was defective. They sent us a new one, however it only lasts around 4 nights before we have to replace the 3v batteries. According to the product they should last a month. My sons alarm only goes off once a night, so not remotely in use accessively. We like the alarm but the frequency of battery changes is a bit ridiculous so we will be searching for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This was the best product we have found. Our 8 year old son was wetting the bed since he was a baby. EVERY NIGHT! He was so disappointed in himself. It was really heart breaking. He is a deep sleeper and he could not wake himself up. The doctor suggested that we try the alarm. We were hesitant at first, but we are so happy we tried it. In about two weeks he was dry. He is no longer wearing it and he has been dry at night for almost two months!!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Success!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for a few weeks and it has been a huge success. From nightly accidents to one in a 2 week span. The alarm is accurate, easy to clean and loud enough that parents (down the hall) can hear and help with the response if needed. Reasonable price compared to other similar brands. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked for us.
customer_reviews.text: Our child was excited to start using his new "pee-alarm" as we call it. On night two, he hated it. LOL. It didn't matter, we helped him press through the inconvenience of using it and having to get up to use the restroom. Seriously, within a week he started going all night without peeing in his diapers. This thing worked for us. The fact that our son didn't like this doesn't make it a bad product.... it does what it's supposed to, at least for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old was still wetting the bed basically every night. Tried everything. My daughter was super excited to get this alarm. Clipped on her underwear and put a pull-up on over in. First couple weeks she was waking up to the alarm, she would get up finish going potty, change underwear and back to sleep. Completely accident free within about 6 weeks!!
customer_reviews.author: T_Russ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Helped my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Worked great. My daughter is 8 years old and still having bed wetting problems we finally did something about it and bought this. After using even for a couple days she started getting out of bed and going in the toilet. We stopped using it after using it for about 6 - 8 weeks becasue she kept staying dry and still remains the same today. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm with long battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd alarm for my son and so far its working much better than the first two. My only complaint with this alarm is the volume level is not adjustable and my son is such a heavy sleeper that my husband and I have to tag team sleeping with him and waking him when the alarm sounds. Other than the volume level, its a great alarm and I love the way it goes around his arm instead of clipping to a shirt. This is crucial for a kid who doesn't like to sleep in t-shirts or pjs.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Taketa

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my best investment ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my best investment ever!!!!!! From the first night, my 5 year old was awaken and woke me to help him in the bathroom. Its been a week and no more wet beds!!!! I will continue to use it until I feel like he can mange to get up on his own. I thought it would have been awhile before he got the hang of it, but they both impressed me. Thanks Nytone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: It works great, and my nine-year-old adopted son was excited about ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great, and my nine-year-old adopted son was excited about putting stickers on it initially. My son had broken two bedwetting alarms made by a different company, so he helped me select this product. This product appears to be made better. Unfortunately, I have found that my son turns the alarm off prior to it going off, or he completely takes it off his underpants. I wish there was a different way to do it, so it wouldn't be so easy. We have not seen an improvement with my son, but in all fairness to this company, my son does not desire to be potty-trained yet.
customer_reviews.author: Persian Goddess

customer_reviews.title: He liked picking out his sticker to personalize it
customer_reviews.text: My son (7 years old) peed every night. I tried limiting his liquids and waking him up several times per night (exhausting for everyone). Finally, when I just couldn't take it anymore, doing laundry every day, as a full time single mom was just too much. I read the reviews and bought this alarm. I can't believe how it worked!!! He liked picking out his sticker to personalize it. I'm not sure why I was hesitant to ever purchase an alarm but I tell you what- it has been worth it's weight in gold!! Love it and the piece of mind... not just for me but confidence for my son! Don't wait. Order it today!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough at all
customer_reviews.text: So been using it for a week. It isn't waking him up at all. Will give it another week and then return it, if needed. The sound is not loud at all, wayy lower than an alarm clock. Which I kind of understand because it is so close to him (on his arm) but still should be louder. If any tiny noise doesn't wake up your kid then I don't think I would recommend this to anyone. I will give it another week though and update my review.
customer_reviews.author: K.Sackal

customer_reviews.title: Our son put the alarm on his thigh instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son put the alarm on his thigh instead of his arm for comfort. Used for our 6yr boy... was wetting bed Each night . this alarm adjusted his sleep/wake so No more bed wetting! Took about 1 month of usage to get results.! Son is 9 now, never had an accident since using this!
customer_reviews.author: Todd S.

customer_reviews.title: The bad: the arm band falls off very easily (it ...
customer_reviews.text: The alarm works well and has been helping my son. The bad: the arm band falls off very easily (it unlatches when bumped); the cord doesn't allow for long sleeved shirts, which can be a problem in the winter. It would be great if the unit could be Bluetooth or zwave. It would be a lot safer than the long cord.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product!!! We had tried everything for our 8 year old. The first couple of weeks using the alarm took a little adjusting, but now after a couple months, she stays dry at least half the time. She has started to wake up on her own to pee and I know it’s because of this product. She continues to improve and I’m so thankful for this alarm. It’s saving me a lot of time washing sheets and wet clothes. It’s also improving her confidence. Wish I had bought it sooner!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Potty-trained my son!
customer_reviews.text: This is the reason my son no longer wets the bed. It was easy to use and effective. Yes, you will wake up to a screaming child and wet sheets a few times (I think we probably did about 5 times), but it is SO worth it. My son simply slept too deeply and would not wake up when he needed to use the bathroom. This solved that problem. I recommend wrapping your child in a waterproof blanket and putting a waterproof pad on the bed--so you don't need to change the sheets in the middle of the night. I plan to use this with my other children if/when they need it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Dysfunctional after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: We followed all instructions and woke child every one to two hours through the night for the first two weeks. Our child never woke to the alarm sound or vibration. After 1 month of use the sounding alarm failed and it only vibrated. We were now outside of the return window and out a lot of money. Our child didn't wet the bed any less than before we tried the alarm. Product didn't meet our needs. I contacted the company without any response. If contacted by company, I may change ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McGrew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clip on
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clip on. Easy to operate. My son, 14, gave it a shot (reluctantly) and it worked. Sometimes it went off and it shouldn't have, but for those facing this struggle, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Simms

customer_reviews.title: It worked slowly but surely love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 years old and we have always had a problem with bed wetting... i stayed buying her diapers until her dr suggested a bed wetting alarm... i got it and let me tell you i hate the fact i didnt buy it sooner... thanks to this alarm i now know the time she pees and she has gone 2 weeks already without peeing the bed... and i have tried everything.... from no liquids after 6pm .... pills .... home remedies...to midwives fibs and this has worked.... thank you very much!!!! Please buy it i promise you will not regret it.....
customer_reviews.author: Nayma

customer_reviews.title: We have been using this alarm for a month now ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this alarm for a month now. My son is still wetting the bed a few times a week, and still have to wake him up. The alarm hopefully will do the job eventually. My only complaint is the alarm sound really isn't that loud. Others say it was very loud, but it hardly wakes me up in the next room, and that is after it has been going off for who knows how long. I just wish it was a bit more obnoxious sounding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle device. Kiddo self-potty trained.
customer_reviews.text: We had almost given up hope on our 6-year old very, very heavy sleeper. The first week was rough (waking up to clean up accidents), but he caught on super quick. By day 10, he was golden, and now a month later, he has only had two accidents. Works like a charm. I like that the sensor is close to the moisture source, unlike a mat... this way the alarm is triggered immediately, helping him to shut the flow down quick. We really wish we would have done this a year or three ago... we would have saved a small fortune in overnight diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Woodchuck Willie

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter (9) who was a DEEP ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter (9) who was a DEEP sleeper and had a hard time waking up at night, to use the bathroom. We reduced water before bed, woke her up at different times to use the toilet, but she was still wetting the bed. After using this product- she was completely dry after 1 week!! Will be using this to overnight train our 5 year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really strong vibration.  Otherwise seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since it said 'Strong vibration' as my child has hearing problems. Honestly my phone vibrates more. Its very mild and doesn't wake him up. Even holding it you can barely feel it. It definitely is functional and would probably work for a hearing child.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: It worked!!! My 10 year old is very happy that it actually worked. It only took 3 days but he continued to wear it for 2 weeks just to be sure. The 1st night he peed the bed like normal, the next two nights he peed a very small amount only enough to trigger the alarm and he quickly woke up and went to the restroom. Every night after that he would get up and go pee before the alarm went off. And now some nights he gets up and some nights he don't but he wakes up dry!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I thought this was worth a try but didn't really belive It would actually work. We have used it for 3 weeks and my daughter is 6. She hardly never woke up dry. Maybe once every other month. Now she is on 4 days in a row dry. And one night she woke up in the middle of the night to go to the bathroom by herself. That has never happened. I am so excited I give her a pack of stickers for every dry day.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Gets job done
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old puts it on by himself every night, and it has worked wonderfullly. Highly recommend for any parent having trouble potty training
customer_reviews.author: Nikki L

customer_reviews.title: Worth a shot.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not working yet but my son uses it every night on his own and is proud to have made it his mission to use this until he stops wetting at night. Gives him ownership.
customer_reviews.author: foxytv

customer_reviews.title: Stops working before you can get your child through the program!
customer_reviews.text: This alarm has stopped working properly after just 2 months use. Batteries have been changed multiple times and it still does not work correctly. We have followed instructions exactly for cleaning and maintenance. Last night was another night of many that it never went off, but should have. Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Evans

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: doesnt work at all we tried this for 4 weeks. now Im one day over the return date as I we to print the label this am
customer_reviews.author: Irishchix

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this alarm for our 7 year old son. He had been wetting the bed and in a pull up since he was a baby. Our pediatrician told us to try an alarm to see if it helped. My husband and I were thinking how could this product fix night time bedwetting. We started the alarm on February 15th..and today..we are about 95% dry at night. My son actually wants to wear it..and it has given him so much confidence that he can stay dry at nighr. I would highly recommend this product...just stay consistent and it will work!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy your own batteries
customer_reviews.text: It came with dead batteries :( kind of a bummer because my son was really looking forward to trying it out, and I could have picked up batteries had I known. I’ll have to update once I get it working!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny G.

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad we stuck with it and didn’t give up
customer_reviews.text: Stick with it!! I was getting discouraged after two weeks and then BAM she hasn’t peed once for almost 6 days now!! I am so glad we stuck with it and didn’t give up. It’s definitely worth the money and beats spending money on pull ups all the time!! :)
customer_reviews.author: J Donati

customer_reviews.title: Should have gotten it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten this sooner. Worked really well for my child only took a couple of weeks for her to start staying dry almost every night! She loved getting to choose the sticker to put on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Teeny

customer_reviews.title: Horribe!! We never could hear the alarm and ...
customer_reviews.text: Horribe!! We never could hear the alarm and after using just a few times, it totally stopped working. Totally not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real pleased with how this is going
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is nowhere near loud enough. In 21 days, my 7 yo son has only had 5 dry nights (I wake him up to go before going to bed) Of the other 16 times he's wet the bed, he's only heard the alarm once. I only heard it the first week when I was sleeping on his floor- I can't do THAT anymore. Not real pleased with how this is going :(
customer_reviews.author: L'objectif

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I got this to train my dog to not mark. Doesn’t work well at all. Clipped it to a diaper and no alarm. What a waste of $$$$
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly kern

customer_reviews.title: Calculate cost of four months of diapers vs this thing - WORTH IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked exactly as it says. My daughter struggled to wake up to potty and was about to turn six, so at our pediatrician’s advice, I tried this. Worked like a charm!!! I can’t rate this higher or I would. She needed it for about three months and that was it. Worth every single penny.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver
customer_reviews.text: Was at my witts end with my 6.5 year old. This device did the trick. It really has trained his brain to wake up. The online video and instructions were very helpful on advising how to get started as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works brilliantly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for son who just turned 9 and was still wetting the bed. I wish I had bought this product a year earlier. Initially, device alarm started waking up my son in the middle of the night as soon as he started to pee. Easy to turn off and my son got up and went to bathroom. By week 4-5 alarm going off just before he woke up as he was learning to hold it in longer. By week 6, I took off and he has been dry every since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: It helped my child stop wetting the bed in about 6 weeks. It is easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: uncimaka

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a month
customer_reviews.text: My older child appreciates the small, unobtrusive format of an arm band, and the vibrations have a bigger impact. Good idea but it broke in less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: bdaygift

customer_reviews.title: Potty trained
customer_reviews.text: Works great with in weeks we noticed a difference! He loved all the customization he could make with the sticker an the ability to change the alarm tone.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey kistler

customer_reviews.title: After years of trying everything else, we're finally bought ...
customer_reviews.text: After years of trying everything else, we're finally bought the alarm. It took a couple months for my son to get the hang of it, but we're going on 3 weeks with no bedwetting now! My only regret is not purchasing earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much for this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: We were skeptical at first but this product actually worked for our almost 7 year old daughter! In a little over one week, she was sleeping through the night without wearing a pull-up or wetting her sheets. Thank you so much for this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R Kufalk

customer_reviews.title: This alarm really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been an absolute lifesaver! My 7 year old daughter was having the hardest time getting out of pull-ups at night. By the second night of wearing the alarm she was already waking herself up. We started using the alarm a month ago, and she hasn’t worn it for a week! I’m wondering why I didn’t buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H Haux

customer_reviews.title: This alarm was the best thing we did
customer_reviews.text: This alarm was the best thing we did! My 6 year old son was wetting the bed every night since he was a sound sleeper. We did the alarm every night for 3 months (it stopped sounding after the first few weeks since he was already getting trained) and he hasn't had a single issue since stopping. It completely re-trained his body! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works just follow the instructions. It’s a life saver for a child completely frustrated with bed wetting. The product did stop working after a couple of months but the company responded quickly and had a new one sent out within a couple of days. Stellar customer service and a product that does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He has 3-4 or 5 dry nights and 1 bad night. But better than every night
customer_reviews.text: It works. My son began to anticipate it would go off, he began waking himself. This happened in 2 weeks. I had to change tone a few times. He has 3-4 or 5 dry nights and 1 bad night. But better than every night. Happy
customer_reviews.author: Happy mom

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! This work so well for my little boy, he was having a lot of trouble wetting the bed and this but an end to that. Don’t know what I would have done without it!!
customer_reviews.author: vanessakhuber

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but it won't stay on during the night
customer_reviews.text: Although my daughter loved being able to decorate it with stickers and the arm band, it kept turning off every night. We even put duct tape over the on/off switch, but still turned off. It was not as loud as the Malem alarm, but seemed like it would work well. We are sending it back because it won't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stuller

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Had been struggling with our 7 yr old in getting him trained at night. This alarm worked wonders- after about a month he is now completely night time potty trained! He also loved the stickers you could put on the alarm. Definitely follow the directions and plans laid out in the box/on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great Alarm!
customer_reviews.text: This alarm was great! I love the arm band feature. My child liked that a lot better than clipping something on her pajamas. After using this alarm for about 3 weeks she is now dry for the night. She loved also that she could personalize the alarm with stickers. I would recommend this alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly9478

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: It works. Easy to put on. Sensitive sensor. Still using the original batteries since 3 weeks. Nice that a bunch of replacement batteries were included. My boy liked the collection of stickers, he choose one to customize his device. Alarm could be a little louder, but by now my little boy woke up in time.
customer_reviews.author: drakula

customer_reviews.title: Could be louder
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't think it is very loud. I would have to be in same room sleeping to hear it. Even with a monitor on it can't be heard.
customer_reviews.author: Maximume01

customer_reviews.title: Alarm Doesn’t Wake Child
customer_reviews.text: We followed all the directions on this device, looked at the website to to troubleshoot - and it never worked. The alarm never woke my child, whether I let him get into deep REM or not.
customer_reviews.author: James Kiel

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, helped my child stop bed wetting in two weeks. The first week is the roughest as adults need to assist with helping their child awake to the alarm and follow the route suggested by Nytone.
customer_reviews.author: liquidus

customer_reviews.title: This has been the best $50 I have spent in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best $50 I have spent in a long time! My 7 1/2 year old son wore pull ups at night until he started using the alarm. The first week was tough, but now a month in, he hasn't set the alarm off for a couple weeks. We are so proud of him and more importantly, he is happy to be a big boy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G.

customer_reviews.title: amazing product- life changing
customer_reviews.text: Buy this product. In a month he now no longer needs it. It is amazing and will change your child's life and yours in laundry time/sheets.. I regret I didnt order this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wanko

customer_reviews.title: This alarm works exactly as described. Within 6 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: This alarm works exactly as described. Within 6 weeks of using the monitor my 5 year old son was completely dry at night and has been dry ever since.
customer_reviews.author: ashley mcginness

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only used this a week to fix a regression!! Totally worth the $50!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Czarnecki

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! We only needed to use it for about ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! We only needed to use it for about a week and it helped my child learn to wake up at night. I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think this product has great potential, but my son keeps ripping it off in his sleep.
customer_reviews.author: rlw0509

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Sadly,this product did not work for my son. The alarm was not loud enough.However, I would like to say that customer service from Nytone Medical Products was outstanding and for that alone they should be commended.
customer_reviews.author: joye mayer

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product, safe and easy
customer_reviews.text: Within 3 months my son is dry all night. This is an amazing product, safe and easy. Well worth the money. Wish I would have bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for great for my grand daughter and was comfortable at night!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Previously opened and/or used
customer_reviews.text: Not even about to try it. It’s clearly an open item (missing stickers), not wrapped up, dirt marks and fraying on the armband. One can only assumes it’s used.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Trondle

customer_reviews.title: Tried all the batteries plus bought new ones to try ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried all the batteries plus bought new ones to try. Doesn't work. Trying to return for a refund but Amazon won't accept return on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience
customer_reviews.text: This product conked out after only a few nights. So we then replaced the batteries, and it conked out again. Perhaps, this was a faulty individual unit, but we've decided to go with a more expensive, competitor product in hopes that we have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We used this and now have sucessfully overnight trained our 7 yr old! On to the next kiddo!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First few nights it went off bit after the 5th night no accidents
customer_reviews.author: Tara Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: It would not stop beeping
customer_reviews.text: It would not stop beeping after one use. That's all I have to say. Oh! and that I want a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately our unit did not work properly and the alarm sounded every time the clip was closed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Bender

customer_reviews.title: Good idea. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: While the concept is good, the materials aren’t high quality. The metal teeth inside the clip stretch out with normal use and easily come unclipped from the child’s underwear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Eats through batteries quickly and volume could be louder (or optional at least)
customer_reviews.author: texan2012

customer_reviews.title: At first I didnt think it was going to work ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I didnt think it was going to work cause it would turn off while she was sleep. So I put tape over it and that worked. After about 3 weeks of wearing it she don't pee at night and she is 8 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stripped screw on a "New" Nytone
customer_reviews.text: Just received the newly purchased Nytone for my 6 year old and screw is stripped! How am I suppose to add the batteries and use it? Feeling very inconvenient. Sent an email to Nytone. I hope they respond!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not wake up the child, will be in contact with manufacturer. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Christopher

customer_reviews.title: didn't work and past return window. If your child ...
customer_reviews.text: didn't work and past return window. If your child is a very deep sleeper I don't see this working for you.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! I'm so glad I purchased it for my son. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Multitaskingmom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! Gave my 9 year old the confidence she needed to get away from pull ups overnight! Hooray!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my son and it has broke ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and it has broke. We have only had it for a month. Very disappointing for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The volume is too low. It just does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Irena Begelfor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks our daughter is already waking herself up on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rotz

customer_reviews.title: Works great 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many things with my daughter and have not had much success until I bought this product. It works great and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jarin Andreasen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product...should have gotten it years ago!!! My son has been dry for over 2 months now!!!
customer_reviews.author: vick hater

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a miracle worker. Daughter age 7 is finally having dry nights.
customer_reviews.author: Nickole

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work for my kid.. he was never able to wake up to the sound
customer_reviews.author: Ali M

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didnt come with stickers seams to work after fighting with him about it do to no sickers
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Acosta
